reviewtext: I'm not a PDA Junky, but I sure stay very busy and thisdevice is the best Christmas gift I've ever had.PALM VX has plenty of Muscle to cover my everyday needsand keeps me focused in my daily reports plus my own personalagenda....There's the M515 now with 16MB but will you ever use them?I doubt it.....
summary: SIMPLE & EASY TO USE-AN EXCELENT OVERALL TOOL
